text: Days and Nights () is a 1944 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper.Биография Евгения МоргуноваДни и ночи It stars Vladimir Solovyov, Daniil Sagal, and Yuri Lyubimov. == Actors == * Vladimir Solovyov as Capt. Saburov (as V. Solovyov) * Daniil Sagal as Vanin (as D. Sagal) * Yuri Lyubimov as Lt. Maslennikov (as Yu. Lyubimov) * Anna Lisyanskaya as Anya Klimenko (as A. Lisyanskaya) * Lev Sverdlin as Col. Protsenko (as L. Sverdlin) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1944 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper
title: Days and Nights (1944 movie)
